law.catch_line: Disposition of records after review by the convening authority.
law.text: Except as otherwise required by this code, all records of trial and related documents shall be transmitted and disposed of as prescribed by regulation and provided by law.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 70, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 45. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 63, effective July 1, 1954.
